name: Conflux Comprehensive
description: A HUGE Conflux-flavored package: Domain, basic landcycling, exalted, devour, unearth, Naya 5-power, colored artifacts, and multicolor-matters. Includes panoramas-style lands and mythic-level exotic effects.

Creature: Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
Other creatures you control get +1/+1 as long as {THIS} is tapped.
Domain — When {THIS} enters, you gain {N} life for each basic land type among lands you control.
If you control a multicolored permanent, creatures you control get vigilance until end of turn.
As long as you control a creature with power 5 or greater, creatures you control get +1/+1.
{THIS} has protection from red and from black.
